channel.title: Oldschool 2006, 2007, simple base looking to expand
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Hello, I wanted to recreate an Oldschool server similar to the days of Runescape 06, 07. I know a fair amount of coding client, server, and web sided.[/size]
Format to which you should fill out an application if you're interested.
Name: Skype: Why you want to join: Experience: Misc:
My Skype is un.named40
Some of the things I think are essential to adding into server are:
-Strong economy -All skills working properly -Hard to make money hard to train -Fully functional bosses -Fully functional minigames -Unique content, player titles, membership ect. -15+ Quests similar to Runescape
What is already added: -Pest Control -Fight Pits -Dual arena -Fully working Barrows -Perfected combat (magic, range, melee) -Mining -Prayer -2 basic quests, Monkey Madness, Desert Treasure -Server Rework now more stable -Slayer helm other fun items added
What needs to be done asap: -Client rework -Skill rework, almost all of them -Shops
This base is very basic, but I hope to eventually make something out of it with a team. I'm looking for serious applications only. Thank you for your time.
Some Media I have provided,
Tokkul Shop, bought with Tokkuls which are gained from slaying monsters in fight caves, or defeating Jad.
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img661/8504/4bWmvL.png[/img]
Barrows working except animation for the spade.
http://gyazo.com/7cd507a489d92659a5823946badce652
Slayer working.
http://gyazo.com/1f50225a670467700bb273b24ad7392d
Slayer tasks:
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img912/5157/BjzkDF.png[/img]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img905/6127/ZfR365.png[/img]
http://gyazo.com/54036a2b3fffda77531e685510cd7caf
http://gyazo.com/01130484e599d49fa0e3a20d6509f59b
http://gyazo.com/d369b17b67c7ab148e71630be5914359
http://gyazo.com/e3a62548dc5b0672fc657b0231199f25
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img912/1526/iPnxtR.png[/img]
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img631/8189/XCs1ks.png[/img]

@Unnamed40 wrote:

[size=24pt]Hello, I wanted to recreate an Oldschool server similar to the days of Runescape 06, 07. I know a fair amount of coding client, server, and web sided.[/size]

Format to which you should fill out an application if you’re interested.

Name:

My Skype is un.named40

Some of the things I think are essential to adding into server are:

-Strong economy
-All skills working properly
-Hard to make money hard to train
-Fully functional bosses
-Fully functional minigames
-Unique content, player titles, membership ect.
-15+ Quests similar to Runescape

-Fight Pits
-Dual arena
-Fully working Barrows
-Perfected combat (magic, range, melee)
-Mining

-Server Rework now more stable
-Slayer helm other fun items added

What needs to be done asap:
-Client rework
-Skill rework, almost all of them
-Shops

This base is very basic, but I hope to eventually make something out of it with a team. I’m looking for serious applications only. Thank you for your time.
